about_the_game:
Three Kingdoms: Legend of heroes: The Battle of Guandu is an expansion pack of Three Kingdoms: Legend of heroes. The game adopts the new story beginning with the battle of Guandu in this DLC.

New content:
1. Marriage system: When there is a female character in the player's power, there might be a coincidence that the marriage character can be triggered. After marriage, there is a chance to have a child.
2. Adding the power of Han Xiandi, Han Xiandi has a hidden quest line [Revitalize the Han Dynasty]
3. Advance the progress of the game, the game begins with the 200-year battle of Guandu
Including: Han Xiandi, Yuan Shao, Cao Cao, Liu Bei, Liu Biao, Sun Ce, Ma Teng, Zhang Lu, Liu Wei, Gong Sundu
4. More exclusive equipment of the military commander, a new game story.
